text: Elephantine is an island in the River Nile, which forms part of the city of Aswan, Egypt. It is about by in size. People have lived there since Ancient Egyptian times. Today, there are a number of ruins on the island. It also features a botanical garden with a large collection of palm trees. Category:Ancient Egypt Category:Archaeological sites in Egypt Category:Aswan Governorate Category:Islands of Africa Category:World Heritage Sites in Egypt
title: Elephantine
